extendedInfo.description: Designed exclusively for eMarketer clients, Executive View keeps you one step ahead of the competition by delivering the digital marketing and media information you need to knowâanywhere, anytime.Features and Functions:- On-the-go access for eMarketer clients.- Read the latest digital articles, analysis, interviews and reports.- Search for the exact information you need in seconds.- Mark âFavoritesâ with a star for quick reference. - Read content offline without internet access.Please note: your company must be an eMarketer client to use this app. Contact our sales team at 212-763-6010 for more information.

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: App force closes every time. HTC one X 4.1.2
reviews.author: Craig Nebeker

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: Randomly crashes at times and then keeps doing so for a while! option to share ought to be present as well!
reviews.author: Prateek Chhillar
